subject: Motivation for the upcoming race
body:
Hey [Athlete],

I know the upcoming race is challenging, but remember your training and stay focused. You've got this!

Best,
[Your Name]

subject: Post-race recovery tips
body:
Hi [Athlete],

Great job on the race! For recovery, make sure to hydrate well and get plenty of rest. Looking forward to our next training session.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
